sys_ux_data_broker_transform.description: Filters fieldElements list in nowRecordFormBlob for name === property. Returns a list of Choices from the field.

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_683715_big_oil_2.mapChoiceListFromGlideFormData</api_name><description>Filters fieldElements list in nowRecordFormBlob for name === property. Returns a list of Choices from the field.</description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>mapChoiceListFromGlideFormData</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
    {
      "name": "fieldName",
      "label": "Field Name",
      "description": "Name of field containing choices",
      "readOnly": false,
      "fieldType": "string",
      "mandatory": true
    },
    {
      "name": "fieldElements",
      "label": "Field Elements",
      "description": "List of field elements from GlideForm data",
      "readOnly": false,
      "fieldType": "object",
      "mandatory": true
    }
  ]</props><required_translations>[{"message":"Field Elements","comment":""},{"message":"Name of field containing choices","comment":""},{"message":"Field Name","comment":""},{"message":"List of field elements from GlideForm data","comment":""}]</required_translations><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {
  // 	var el = input.fieldElements;
  // 	var obj = {};
  // 	obj.res = el;

  var target = input.fieldElements.filter(function (field) {
    return field.name === input.fieldName;
  });

  return target;

  //   var target = input.fieldElements.filter(function (field) {
  //     return field.name === input.fieldName;
  //   });

  //   var choices = target[0].choices;
  //   var returnList = [];

  //   choices.forEach(function (choice) {
  //     var obj = {};

  //     obj.id = el.value;
  //     obj.label = el.displayValue;
  //     obj.value = el.value;
  //     returnList.push(obj);
  //   });

  //   return returnList;
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-09-12 22:47:58</sys_created_on><sys_id>93b1d5bd0762301029a8f0269c1ed0dc</sys_id><sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count><sys_name>mapChoiceListFromGlideFormData</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Big Oil 2" source="x_683715_big_oil_2">828fcb8c0762301029a8f0269c1ed070</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Big Oil 2">828fcb8c0762301029a8f0269c1ed070</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform_93b1d5bd0762301029a8f0269c1ed0dc</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-09-13 21:24:59</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_transform><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=93b1d5bd0762301029a8f0269c1ed0dc"/></record_update>
